title: 【PVE】【籽岷录制】ZOMBIE EPIDEMIC|僵尸传染病|多人联机|1.11.2|LETZTACO/GORIMEAR
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:20 编辑 




简介INFOFight to survive against countless of zombies in 50 waves and 5 different arenas. All with a custom shop and custom weapons.Your job is to clear out all the zombies in each of the five arenas. While doing so, you will have access to a shop with custom weapons that are purchasable using the currency obtained from killing zombies. Each arena has two new unique zombies that have unique abilities and make them harder from the rest. There are ten waves in each arena, the tenth wave being a boss. Complete all five arenas to finish the map. Play with friends to make it more of a challenge!在5个战斗场地跟无数的僵尸在50回合里战斗。所有的都有商店和各种武器。
你的任务是要在五个场地把所有的僵尸打死。在你干这事的同时，你还需要用你杀掉僵尸的数量来买一些装备武器。每一个场地都有2个新的种类僵尸和技能让你有越来越少的时间来休息。每个场地有10波僵尸，在第十波将有一个BOSS。打完5个场地，你就完成了此地图。









特征 featuresMultiplayer compatible5 unique arenas5 unique boss battlesA custom shop with custom weaponsDeaths appear in the TAB listHealth appears above players' headsPlayer kill count is revealed at the end of the map
可以多人联机5个场地5个BOSS有商店系统死亡数会写在TAB键按下的玩家列表上血量会写在玩家头顶玩家击杀数会在最后透露

钢剑-10杀铁剑-80杀传奇的剑-175杀弓-125杀血量加成-60杀双倍速度-60杀免疫力-15杀粒子-100杀分心-10杀雪球-5杀马-200杀原子弹-200杀炸弹-20杀光线发射器-10杀农村人套装-20杀骑士套装-50杀闪亮的套装-120杀传奇的套装-200杀地雷-15杀重力发射器-30杀空气炮弹-30杀弓箭升级-50杀扭打挂钩-100杀行刑者-200杀护盾-50杀火箭发射筒-300杀闪电法杖-20杀







附加信息 Extra infoRender distance must be set at 8 or aboveNo resource pack required, nor does it come with the mapIf the next wave won't start, right click the "Help" book and click page 2 to teleport to the nearest zombie (If you cannot find it yourself)Most items are used by dropping the item (Default is Q)The map can be played back from wave 1 once finishedYou most likely will need a BEEFY COMPUTER to play this map smoothly
Redstoner = LetzTacoBuilder = Gorimear
渲染距离必须要8或以上无需资源包如果下一回合没有开始右键点击“帮助”书然后到第2页来传送到最近僵尸（如果你找不到自己在哪）基本上所有物品是由丢掉那个物品你需要一个好的电脑来平稳的游玩此地图
红石： LetzTaco建筑：Gorimear
